description:
Black bucchero oenochoe under Oriental influence; blackish clay probably produced by fumigation in a closed furnace; important example.
Bulbous lower part has lions rampant in a row encircling the entire jug; the handles with a flatly rendered crouching beast and two circular members enriched with feline masks; trefoil lip; repaired and small fragment missing from foot
title: Bucchero oenochoe
